sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(input(
		Prop_0 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 join(Prop_0 == add(),
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
